name: One Day (Shaib, Maÿllis)
description:
---------------------------------- The Game ----------------------------------

One Day has been created during the Rainbow Jam'18, theme "Safe space".

In this game, you will have to make your way through the day, enjoying warm moments and battling intolerance, to finally get to your safe space.

Navigate through different tables by finding the right object to click on !

Gameplay based on minigames / point and click.
Developped on Unity, all assets created for the jam.
Controls 100% mouse : movement + right click/left click.

---------------------------------- The Team ----------------------------------

Graphics :

  • Maÿllis

Sounds :

  • Marie-Lou Henry-Viel

Developers :

  • Aurelien(Jamy)
  • Shaib (Fred)
